price: 18. Ar tada tas, kuris yra tikintysis kaip tas, kuris yra Fasik (netikintysis ir nepaklusnus Allahui)? Nevienodi jie yra.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
